1.1.0.name: wordpress/admin-sms-alert
1.1.0.description:
Admin SMS Alert sends a SMS Message (Text) to the provided cell phone on the chosen carrier for selected alerts. Alert examples are for comments awaiting approval/spam, approved/disapproved comments, and new pingbacks.

ASMSA is compatible with most US, Canada, and several other countries' cell carriers including Google Voice. United States Canada Denmark Germany India Italy Norway Singapore Sweden United Kingdom
